line: But, being seasoned with a gracious voice,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Obscures the show of evil? In religion,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: What damned error, but some sober brow

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Will bless it and approve it with a text,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Hiding the grossness with fair ornament?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: There is no vice so simple but assumes

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Some mark of virtue on his outward parts:

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: How many cowards, whose hearts are all as false

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: As stairs of sand, wear yet upon their chins

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: The beards of Hercules and frowning Mars;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Who, inward search'd, have livers white as milk;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: And these assume but valour's excrement

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.

line: To render them redoubted! Look on beauty,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.

line: And you shall see 'tis purchased by the weight;

line: Which therein works a miracle in nature,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Making them lightest that wear most of it:

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.

line: So are those crisped snaky golden locks

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.

line: Which make such wanton gambols with the wind,

line: Upon supposed fairness, often known

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Thus ornament is but the guiled shore

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.

line: To a most dangerous sea; the beauteous scarf

line: Veiling an Indian beauty; in a word,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.

line: The seeming truth which cunning times put on

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.

line: Hard food for Midas, I will none of thee;

line: Nor none of thee, thou pale and common drudge

line: 'Tween man and man: but thou, thou meagre lead,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Which rather threatenest than dost promise aught,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Thy paleness moves me more than eloquence;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.

line: And here choose I; joy be the consequence!

line: Aside  How all the other passions fleet to air,

line: Be moderate; allay thy ecstasy,

line: In measure rein thy joy; scant this excess.

line: I feel too much thy blessing: make it less,

line: The painter plays the spider and hath woven

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: A golden mesh to entrap the hearts of men,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Faster than gnats in cobwebs; but her eyes,--

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: How could he see to do them? having made one,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Methinks it should have power to steal both his

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: And leave itself unfurnish'd. Yet look, how far

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: The substance of my praise doth wrong this shadow

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: In underprizing it, so far this shadow

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Doth limp behind the substance. Here's the scroll,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: The continent and summary of my fortune.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: You that choose not by the view,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Chance as fair and choose as true!

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Since this fortune falls to you,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Be content and seek no new,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: If you be well pleased with this

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: And hold your fortune for your bliss,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Turn you where your lady is

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: And claim her with a loving kiss.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: A gentle scroll. Fair lady, by your leave;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: I come by note, to give and to receive.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Like one of two contending in a prize,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: That thinks he hath done well in people's eyes,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Hearing applause and universal shout,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Giddy in spirit, still gazing in a doubt

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Whether these pearls of praise be his or no;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: So, thrice fair lady, stand I, even so;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: As doubtful whether what I see be true,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Until confirm'd, sign'd, ratified by you.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: You see me, Lord Bassanio, where I stand,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Such as I am: though for myself alone

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: I would not be ambitious in my wish,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: To wish myself much better; yet, for you

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: I would be trebled twenty times myself;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: A thousand times more fair, ten thousand times more rich;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: That only to stand high in your account,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: I might in virtue, beauties, livings, friends,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Exceed account; but the full sum of me

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Is sum of something, which, to term in gross,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Is an unlesson'd girl, unschool'd, unpractised;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Happy in this, she is not yet so old

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: But she may learn; happier than this,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: She is not bred so dull but she can learn;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Happiest of all is that her gentle spirit

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Commits itself to yours to be directed,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: As from her lord, her governor, her king.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Myself and what is mine to you and yours

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Is now converted: but now I was the lord

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Of this fair mansion, master of my servants,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Queen o'er myself: and even now, but now,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: This house, these servants and this same myself

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Are yours, my lord: I give them with this ring;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Which when you part from, lose, or give away,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Let it presage the ruin of your love

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: And be my vantage to exclaim on you.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Madam, you have bereft me of all words,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Only my blood speaks to you in my veins;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: And there is such confusion in my powers,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: As after some oration fairly spoke

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: By a beloved prince, there doth appear

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Among the buzzing pleased multitude;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Where every something, being blent together,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Turns to a wild of nothing, save of joy,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Express'd and not express'd. But when this ring

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Parts from this finger, then parts life from hence:

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: O, then be bold to say Bassanio's dead!

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: NERISSA
line: My lord and lady, it is now our time,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: NERISSA
line: That have stood by and seen our wishes prosper,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: NERISSA
line: To cry, good joy: good joy, my lord and lady!

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: My lord Bassanio and my gentle lady,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: I wish you all the joy that you can wish;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: For I am sure you can wish none from me:

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: And when your honours mean to solemnize

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: The bargain of your faith, I do beseech you,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: Even at that time I may be married too.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: With all my heart, so thou canst get a wife.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: I thank your lordship, you have got me one.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: My eyes, my lord, can look as swift as yours:

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: You saw the mistress, I beheld the maid;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: You loved, I loved for intermission.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: No more pertains to me, my lord, than you.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: Your fortune stood upon the casket there,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: And so did mine too, as the matter falls;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: For wooing here until I sweat again,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: And sweating until my very roof was dry

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: With oaths of love, at last, if promise last,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: I got a promise of this fair one here

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: To have her love, provided that your fortune

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: Achieved her mistress.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Is this true, Nerissa?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: NERISSA
line: Madam, it is, so you stand pleased withal.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: And do you, Gratiano, mean good faith?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: Yes, faith, my lord.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Our feast shall be much honour'd in your marriage.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: We'll play with them the first boy for a thousand ducats.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: NERISSA
line: What, and stake down?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: No; we shall ne'er win at that sport, and stake down.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: But who comes here? Lorenzo and his infidel? What,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: and my old Venetian friend Salerio?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Lorenzo and Salerio, welcome hither;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: If that the youth of my new interest here

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Have power to bid you welcome. By your leave,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: I bid my very friends and countrymen,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Sweet Portia, welcome.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: So do I, my lord:

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: They are entirely welcome.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: I thank your honour. For my part, my lord,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: My purpose was not to have seen you here;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: But meeting with Salerio by the way,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: He did entreat me, past all saying nay,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: To come with him along.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: I did, my lord;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: And I have reason for it. Signior Antonio

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: Commends him to you.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Ere I ope his letter,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: I pray you, tell me how my good friend doth.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: Not sick, my lord, unless it be in mind;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: Nor well, unless in mind: his letter there

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: Will show you his estate.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: Nerissa, cheer yon stranger; bid her welcome.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: Your hand, Salerio: what's the news from Venice?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: How doth that royal merchant, good Antonio?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: I know he will be glad of our success;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: GRATIANO
line: We are the Jasons, we have won the fleece.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: I would you had won the fleece that he hath lost.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: There are some shrewd contents in yon same paper,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: That steals the colour from Bassanio's cheek:

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Some dear friend dead; else nothing in the world

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Could turn so much the constitution

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Of any constant man. What, worse and worse!

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: With leave, Bassanio: I am half yourself,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: And I must freely have the half of anything

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: That this same paper brings you.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: O sweet Portia,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Here are a few of the unpleasant'st words

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: That ever blotted paper! Gentle lady,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: When I did first impart my love to you,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: I freely told you, all the wealth I had

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Ran in my veins, I was a gentleman;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: And then I told you true: and yet, dear lady,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Rating myself at nothing, you shall see

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: How much I was a braggart. When I told you

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: My state was nothing, I should then have told you

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: That I was worse than nothing; for, indeed,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: I have engaged myself to a dear friend,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Engaged my friend to his mere enemy,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: To feed my means. Here is a letter, lady;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: The paper as the body of my friend,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: And every word in it a gaping wound,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Issuing life-blood. But is it true, Salerio?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Have all his ventures fail'd? What, not one hit?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: From Tripolis, from Mexico and England,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: From Lisbon, Barbary and India?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: And not one vessel 'scape the dreadful touch

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Of merchant-marring rocks?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: Not one, my lord.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: Besides, it should appear, that if he had

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: The present money to discharge the Jew,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: He would not take it. Never did I know

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: A creature, that did bear the shape of man,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: So keen and greedy to confound a man:

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: He plies the duke at morning and at night,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: And doth impeach the freedom of the state,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: If they deny him justice: twenty merchants,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: The duke himself, and the magnificoes

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: Of greatest port, have all persuaded with him;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: But none can drive him from the envious plea

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: SALERIO
line: Of forfeiture, of justice and his bond.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: JESSICA
line: When I was with him I have heard him swear

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: JESSICA
line: To Tubal and to Chus, his countrymen,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: JESSICA
line: That he would rather have Antonio's flesh

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: JESSICA
line: Than twenty times the value of the sum

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: JESSICA
line: That he did owe him: and I know, my lord,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: JESSICA
line: If law, authority and power deny not,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: JESSICA
line: It will go hard with poor Antonio.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Is it your dear friend that is thus in trouble?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: The dearest friend to me, the kindest man,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: The best-condition'd and unwearied spirit

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: In doing courtesies, and one in whom

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: The ancient Roman honour more appears

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Than any that draws breath in Italy.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: What sum owes he the Jew?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: For me three thousand ducats.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: What, no more?

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Pay him six thousand, and deface the bond;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Double six thousand, and then treble that,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Before a friend of this description

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Shall lose a hair through Bassanio's fault.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: First go with me to church and call me wife,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: And then away to Venice to your friend;

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: For never shall you lie by Portia's side

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: With an unquiet soul. You shall have gold

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: To pay the petty debt twenty times over:

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: When it is paid, bring your true friend along.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: My maid Nerissa and myself meantime

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Will live as maids and widows. Come, away!

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: For you shall hence upon your wedding-day:

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Bid your friends welcome, show a merry cheer:

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Since you are dear bought, I will love you dear.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: But let me hear the letter of your friend.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Reads  Sweet Bassanio, my ships have all

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: miscarried, my creditors grow cruel, my estate is

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: very low, my bond to the Jew is forfeit; and since

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: in paying it, it is impossible I should live, all

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: debts are cleared between you and I, if I might but

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: see you at my death. Notwithstanding, use your

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: pleasure: if your love do not persuade you to come,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: let not my letter.

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: O love, dispatch all business, and be gone!

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: Since I have your good leave to go away,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: I will make haste: but, till I come again,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: No bed shall e'er be guilty of my stay,

scene: SCENE II.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BASSANIO
line: No rest be interposer 'twixt us twain.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: Gaoler, look to him: tell not me of mercy;

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: This is the fool that lent out money gratis:

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: Gaoler, look to him.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Hear me yet, good Shylock.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: I'll have my bond; speak not against my bond:

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: I have sworn an oath that I will have my bond.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: Thou call'dst me dog before thou hadst a cause;

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: But, since I am a dog, beware my fangs:

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: The duke shall grant me justice. I do wonder,

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: Thou naughty gaoler, that thou art so fond

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: To come abroad with him at his request.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: I pray thee, hear me speak.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: I'll have my bond; I will not hear thee speak:

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: I'll have my bond; and therefore speak no more.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: I'll not be made a soft and dull-eyed fool,

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: To shake the head, relent, and sigh, and yield

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: To Christian intercessors. Follow not;

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SHYLOCK
line: I'll have no speaking: I will have my bond.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SALARINO
line: It is the most impenetrable cur

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SALARINO
line: That ever kept with men.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Let him alone:

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: I'll follow him no more with bootless prayers.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: He seeks my life; his reason well I know:

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: I oft deliver'd from his forfeitures

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Many that have at times made moan to me;

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Therefore he hates me.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SALARINO
line: I am sure the duke

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: SALARINO
line: Will never grant this forfeiture to hold.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: The duke cannot deny the course of law:

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: For the commodity that strangers have

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: With us in Venice, if it be denied,

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Will much impeach the justice of his state;

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Since that the trade and profit of the city

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Consisteth of all nations. Therefore, go:

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: These griefs and losses have so bated me,

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: That I shall hardly spare a pound of flesh

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: To-morrow to my bloody creditor.

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Well, gaoler, on. Pray God, Bassanio come

scene: SCENE III.  Venice. A street.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: To see me pay his debt, and then I care not!

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: Madam, although I speak it in your presence,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: You have a noble and a true conceit

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: Of godlike amity; which appears most strongly

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: In bearing thus the absence of your lord.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: But if you knew to whom you show this honour,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: How true a gentleman you send relief,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: How dear a lover of my lord your husband,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: I know you would be prouder of the work

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: Than customary bounty can enforce you.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: I never did repent for doing good,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Nor shall not now: for in companions

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: That do converse and waste the time together,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Whose souls do bear an equal yoke Of love,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: There must be needs a like proportion

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Of lineaments, of manners and of spirit;

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Which makes me think that this Antonio,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Being the bosom lover of my lord,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Must needs be like my lord. If it be so,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: How little is the cost I have bestow'd

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: In purchasing the semblance of my soul

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: From out the state of hellish misery!

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: This comes too near the praising of myself;

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Therefore no more of it: hear other things.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Lorenzo, I commit into your hands

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: The husbandry and manage of my house

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Until my lord's return: for mine own part,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: I have toward heaven breathed a secret vow

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: To live in prayer and contemplation,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Only attended by Nerissa here,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Until her husband and my lord's return:

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: There is a monastery two miles off;

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: And there will we abide. I do desire you

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Not to deny this imposition;

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: The which my love and some necessity

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Now lays upon you.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: Madam, with all my heart;

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: I shall obey you in all fair commands.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: My people do already know my mind,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: And will acknowledge you and Jessica

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: In place of Lord Bassanio and myself.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: And so farewell, till we shall meet again.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: LORENZO
line: Fair thoughts and happy hours attend on you!

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: JESSICA
line: I wish your ladyship all heart's content.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: I thank you for your wish, and am well pleased

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: To wish it back on you: fare you well Jessica.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Now, Balthasar,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: As I have ever found thee honest-true,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: So let me find thee still. Take this same letter,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: And use thou all the endeavour of a man

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: In speed to Padua: see thou render this

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Into my cousin's hand, Doctor Bellario;

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: And, look, what notes and garments he doth give thee,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Bring them, I pray thee, with imagined speed

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Unto the tranect, to the common ferry

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Which trades to Venice. Waste no time in words,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: But get thee gone: I shall be there before thee.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: BALTHASAR
line: Madam, I go with all convenient speed.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Come on, Nerissa; I have work in hand

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: That you yet know not of: we'll see our husbands

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Before they think of us.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: NERISSA
line: Shall they see us?

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: They shall, Nerissa; but in such a habit,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: That they shall think we are accomplished

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: With that we lack. I'll hold thee any wager,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: When we are both accoutred like young men,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: I'll prove the prettier fellow of the two,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: And wear my dagger with the braver grace,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: And speak between the change of man and boy

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: With a reed voice, and turn two mincing steps

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Into a manly stride, and speak of frays

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Like a fine bragging youth, and tell quaint lies,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: How honourable ladies sought my love,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Which I denying, they fell sick and died;

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: I could not do withal; then I'll repent,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: And wish for all that, that I had not killed them;

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: And twenty of these puny lies I'll tell,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: That men shall swear I have discontinued school

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Above a twelvemonth. I have within my mind

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: A thousand raw tricks of these bragging Jacks,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Which I will practise.

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: NERISSA
line: Why, shall we turn to men?

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: Fie, what a question's that,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: If thou wert near a lewd interpreter!

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: But come, I'll tell thee all my whole device

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: When I am in my coach, which stays for us

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: At the park gate; and therefore haste away,

scene: SCENE IV.  Belmont. A room in PORTIA'S house.
speaker: PORTIA
line: For we must measure twenty miles to-day.
